Title: Extends the authority of the town of Newburgh to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Extends the authority of the town of Newburgh to impose a hotel and motel tax for an additional three years; makes a technical change.
LawCode: Ren ยง1202-gg to be ยง1202-gg-2, Tax L; amd ยง2, Chap 371 of 2020
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law in relation to making technical changes thereto, and to amend chapter 371 of the laws of 2020 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the town of Newburgh to impose a hotel and motel tax, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
